entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Snow ending late this evening then clearing. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High minus 10.

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 13 with temperature rising to minus 6 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h late in the evening. Low minus 13 with temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. Wind chill minus 20 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023
